org.apache.shale.validator.converter
Class FloatConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.shale.validator.util.AbstractUtilities
      org.apache.shale.validator.converter.AbstractConverter
          org.apache.shale.validator.converter.FloatConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.component.StateHolder, javax.faces.convert.Converter
public final class FloatConverter
extends AbstractConverter

JavaServer Faces Converter for Float (and int) instances. Parsing and formatting is controlled by the properties that are set on a Converter instance.
